channel.title: Need Server Help... for the 700th time
channel.description:
ok....
I hate this. I've been dreaming of a server for 3 years, then I got it working Saturday night for a few hours, and now it won't fucking work. again.
So, what do I put here?
Also, it says I've port forwarded correctly. Thanks.
[IMG]http://i268.photobucket.com/albums/jj21/XS4rad0min/Picture1.png[/img]
Do I put my personal IP (192.168.1.67), the router IP (192.168.1.254), or my actual IP? (not tellin you :D)
Thanks a lot :D

item.title: Need Server Help... for the 700th time
item.dc:creator: @rawr_i_am_scary rawr i am scary
item.description:
@rawr_i_am_scary wrote:

you have a server with PI?

Program*

So do I :L

item.title: Need Server Help... for the 700th time

item.description:
@rawr_i_am_scary wrote:

Obviously here it’s asking WHICH computer it should be port forwarding to instead of doing it to every single computer.

Thx 4 de rep

By the way, you have a server with PI?
